ISaAC: The Intelligent Safety and Airworthiness Co-Pilot module Based on paper "A Payload Verification and Management Framework for Small UAV-based Personal Remote Sensing Systems" by Cal Coopmans and Chris Coffin. Link: http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/6309316/
ISaAC is intented mainly for mapping applications.
This module processes messages from ISaAC, and either forwards them to the GCS (such as CAMERA_SNAPSHOT or CAMERA_PAYLOAD messages), or responds to them necessary (such as MOVE_WP).
The module assumes the source of the messages is trusted (i.e. not authentication besides AC_ID check is performed).
